text:
Hi am new developer, i have question about HubSpot THEMES CHALLENGE 2021
i have read all rules about this contest but i still confuse please help me with this:

- During the contest my theme must be set free or paid in the Asset Marketplace?

Thanks,

Not sure what you're looking for. You posted this message in the channel last week and received a response, and you received an official response from a HubSpot employee on the forum thread you made about it on devpost.

<@U021H3TV338> I have post this question in Devpost and HubSpot team answer we can add price to HubSpot theme item.
But in section 4 SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS in

(v) Testing:Â Participants must make their themes available free of charge and without any restriction, for testing, evaluation and use by the Sponsor and Judges during the Contest and until the Judging Period ends.

that make me confuse and i try to ask again but no answer.
